K10D0287_H0289:171a-1: a'arya saddharma smri tyu pa sth'a na /

K10D0287_H0289:172a-0: gang gis na dge sbyong goo ta ma'i chos 'dul ba ni nged kyi las khyad par du @172a *//

K10D0287_H0289:172a-5: dang ldan pa sha radva ti'i bu dang bral bas

K10D0287_H0289:172a-11: grong ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /

K10D0287_H0289:172a-13: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha radva ti'i bu
K10D0287_H0289:172a-14: phyi zhig na bsod snyoms blangs te na la ti'i
K10D0287_H0289:172a-15: grong ga la ba der song ngo //
K10D0287_H0289:172a-16: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po tshe dang
K10D0287_H0289:172a-17: ldan pa sha radva ti'i bu ga la ba der
K10D0287_H0289:172a-18: dong ste phyin nas dge slong rab tu mang po
K10D0287_H0289:172a-19: dag gis tshe dang ldan pa sha radva ti'i bu
K10D0287_H0289:172a-20: la bsnyad do // de nas tshe dang ldan pa
K10D0287_H0289:172a-21: sha radva ti'i bus dge slong rab tu mang po
K10D0287_H0289:172a-22: dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0287_H0289:172a-23: gal te bdag tshe dang ldan pa khyed dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab kyi lam srang dang /
K10D0287_H0289:172a-25: sum mdo gcig tu rim gyis dong ba las /
K10D0287_H0289:172a-26: gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba rnams dang phrad par gyur na ni /
K10D0287_H0289:172a-27: des na bdag gis gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa
K10D0287_H0289:172a-28: pa kun tu rgyu ba de dag chos dang mthun
K10D0287_H0289:172a-29: pas tshar bcad zin pa zhig na /

K10D0287_H0289:172b-1: nas 'dir phyin te gang tshe dang ldan pa dag
K10D0287_H0289:172b-2: gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu
K10D0287_H0289:172b-3: ba rnams dang lhan cig gtam byas pa'i dri ba'i
K10D0287_H0289:172b-4: tshul de ni bdag gis tshor yang ma tshor ro
K10D0287_H0289:172b-6: bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan mnga' ba /
K10D0287_H0289:172b-9: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa de ha
K10D0287_H0289:172b-10: cang mi ring ba zhig na mu stegs kyi lta
K10D0287_H0289:172b-11: ba can thams cad zil gyis mnan nas nyan thos
K10D0287_H0289:172b-15: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i chos ston gyi /
K10D0287_H0289:172b-16: khyed de la zhus shig dang /
K10D0287_H0289:172b-18: rnam par smin pa thams cad ston par mdzad de /
K10D0287_H0289:172b-23: bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dag gi ma mthong ba de khyed la ston par mdzad cing /
K10D0287_H0289:172b-24: gang bdag cag gi mngon sum du ma gyur pa
K10D0287_H0289:172b-25: de'ang khyod la bcom ldan 'das shin tu mngon sum
K10D0287_H0289:172b-27: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mkhyen par mdzad do //
K10D0287_H0289:172b-28: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo //
K10D0287_H0289:172b-29: de nas dge slong de dag gi bcom ldan 'das nyin mo'i gnas pas bzhugs pas /
K10D0287_H0289:172b-30: ri rab ltar rang gi 'od kyi dra bas mngon par 'bar ba /
K10D0287_H0289:172b-31: nyin mo'i nyi ma ltar snang bas rab tu gsal ba /
K10D0287_H0289:172b-32: mtshan mo'i zla ba ltar zhi bas rab tu sim par mdzad pa /
K10D0287_H0289:173a-3: ri rab ltar mi g-yo ba /
K10D0287_H0289:173a-5: pha ma ltar 'byung po thams cad kyi skyabs su
K10D0287_H0289:173a-6: gyur pa thugs rje chen pos brlan pa'i thugs sems
K10D0287_H0289:173a-7: can thams cad kyi gnyen gcig par gyur pa /
K10D0287_H0289:173a-11: btang snyoms kyi rten du gyur pa /
K10D0287_H0289:173a-12: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos chen po sum cu rtsa bdun gyis sku brgyan pa /
K10D0287_H0289:173a-13: rab tu dang bas lus can thams cad kyi mig mgu bar mdzad pa /
K10D0287_H0289:173a-15: nyi ma'i 'od zil gyis gnon pa /

K10D0287_H0289:173a-17: spyan dri ma gsum dang bral ba /
K10D0287_H0289:173a-20: bsgom pa gnyis bsgoms shing mngon sum du mdzad pa; lam gyi 'bras bu mngon du mdzad pa /
K10D0287_H0289:173a-22: khams gsum mngon sum du mdzad pa'i spyan mnga' ba /
K10D0287_H0289:173a-23: khams gsum gzhan yang dag par ston pa; khams bco brgyad kyi de nyid mkhyen pa /
K10D0287_H0289:173a-24: mos pa yid la byed pa'i de nyid mkhyen pa /
K10D0287_H0289:173a-25: yon tan gyi klung rang gi yon tan bco brgyad dag dang ldan pa /
K10D0287_H0289:173a-26: srid pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol ba /
K10D0287_H0289:173a-28: bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhis mi bsnyengs pa /
K10D0287_H0289:173a-29: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K10D0287_H0289:173b-0: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang rtag tu ldan pa @173b de mthong ngo //

K10D0287_H0289:173b-2: gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g-yas
K10D0287_H0289:173b-3: pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /

K10D0287_H0289:173b-5: nas dul bas mgo btud de phyogs gcig tu 'khod

K10D0287_H0289:173b-8: yang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
K10D0287_H0289:173b-9: mgo bos phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di

K10D0287_H0289:173b-14: la mchi mchi na zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin

K10D0287_H0289:173b-19: de dag bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //

K10D0287_H0289:173b-26: bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thog mar dge ba
K10D0287_H0289:174a-2: yang dag par rab tu bstan pa bya yi /

K10D0287_H0289:174a-5: de ltar 'chal lo zhes gsol to /
K10D0287_H0289:174a-6: dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa

K10D0287_H0289:174a-11: bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de gang yin zhe
K10D0287_H0289:174a-14: chos ma yin pa la'ang chos ma yin pa nyid
K10D0287_H0289:174a-15: du mthong ba'i dran pa rtag tu nye bar gnas
K10D0287_H0289:174a-16: par 'gyur zhing 'di la the tshom yang mi skye

K10D0287_H0289:174a-18: rgan rabs la'ang rim gro byed do //

K10D0287_H0289:174a-23: skye ba'i rnam par smin pa shes par 'gyur te /

K10D0287_H0289:174a-30: na; sems can pha rol la sems can du 'du
K10D0287_H0289:174a-31: shes shing bsams bzhin du srog chags bsad de srog
K10D0287_H0289:174a-32: dang bral bar byas pa yin no //

K10D0287_H0289:174b-3: 'bring ni lam la gnas pa bsad pa'o //
K10D0287_H0289:174b-5: tshul khrims 'chal pa spyad pa bsad pa'o //
K10D0287_H0289:174b-12: zhe sdang gis byas pa dang /

K10D0287_H0289:174b-16: ne'u le la sogs pa la'o //

K10D0287_H0289:174b-22: rgyu lngas srog gcod pa byas kyang kha na ma tho bas gos par mi 'gyur te /

K10D0287_H0289:174b-25: grog sbur la sogs pa srog dang bral bar byed pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:174b-26: gzhan la mtshon cha gzas pa las bsams pa dang
K10D0287_H0289:174b-27: mi ldan par gzhan la phog ste de srog dang
K10D0287_H0289:174b-28: bral ba dang / nad pa la sman pa phan par 'dod pas nyes par mthong ste /
K10D0287_H0289:174b-29: sman byin pa las de shi ba dang /

K10D0287_H0289:174b-31: me 'bar ba'i nang du srog chags mi 'dod bzhin
K10D0287_H0289:174b-32: du lhung ba ste rgyu rnam pa de lngas srog
K10D0287_H0289:175a-2: yang srog gcod pa rnam pa gsum ste /

K10D0287_H0289:175a-10: shes pa'am / lha'i mig gis mthong ste pha rol
K10D0287_H0289:175a-11: gyis yongs su bzung ba la bdag gir bya ba'i
K10D0287_H0289:175a-12: bsam pas rku bar byed pa 'di ni ma byin
K10D0287_H0289:175a-13: par len pa rdzogs pa yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:175a-14: 'bras bu chung ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10D0287_H0289:175a-16: rgyal po'i chad pas nyen pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:175a-22: rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:175a-24: ltogs pa de dag gi don du ma byin par
K10D0287_H0289:175a-25: blangs pa 'di ni 'bras bu chung ba yin no
K10D0287_H0289:175a-26: // ma byin par len pa'i sdom pa ma blangs
K10D0287_H0289:175a-27: pas ma byin par len pa 'di ni rnam par
K10D0287_H0289:175a-28: smin pa chung ba yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:175a-30: 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur ba ni ma byin par len pa byas nas sems kyis 'chags par byed /
K10D0287_H0289:175a-32: pha rol yang ma byin par len pa las phyir zlog par byed /
K10D0287_H0289:175a-33: sdom pa'i lung yang 'bogs par byed /
K10D0287_H0289:175b-0: ma byin par len pa spong ba dag la 'jog par byed cing las kyi nyer @175b bsdogs dang /
K10D0287_H0289:175b-1: las kyi mjug mi byed pa'o //
K10D0287_H0289:175b-2: ma byin par len pa'i las kyi nyer bsdogs ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10D0287_H0289:175b-3: 'di la ma byin par len pa pos pha rol
K10D0287_H0289:175b-4: la g-yo sgyu byed cing gsang thabs su smra ba
K10D0287_H0289:175b-5: dang / 'jal lugs la g-yo byed pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:175b-6: mi rigs pa'i las lhag mar spyod pa rnam pa
K10D0287_H0289:175b-7: 'di dag ni las kyi nyer bsdogs pa yin no
K10D0287_H0289:175b-8: // las ji lta bu yin zhe na /

K10D0287_H0289:175b-10: rdzas kyi rnam pa ma byin par len pa 'di
K10D0287_H0289:175b-12: las kyi mjug ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10D0287_H0289:175b-13: 'di la byas nas rjes su yi rang bar byed
K10D0287_H0289:175b-14: cing goms par byed la mang du byas te rjes
K10D0287_H0289:175b-15: su yi rang ba kun tu 'chab par byed /
K10D0287_H0289:175b-16: tshul khrims dang ldan pa gzhan ma byin par len
K10D0287_H0289:175b-17: pa la rab tu 'jog par byed pa 'di ni
K10D0287_H0289:175b-19: rnam pa 'di gsum gyis ma byin par len pa'i las kyi nyer bsdogs dang /
K10D0287_H0289:175b-20: mjug dang bral ba ma byin pa len pa'i chad pa'i 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:175b-21: myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa ma yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:175b-23: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10D0287_H0289:175b-24: rnal 'byor spyod pa chos la chos kyi rjes su
K10D0287_H0289:175b-25: lta bas mthong ste 'di la 'dod pas log par

K10D0287_H0289:175b-28: gzhan byed pa la'ang rjes su yi rang bar byed /
K10D0287_H0289:176a-0: mi byed pa'ang thabs kyis byed du @176a *//
K10D0287_H0289:176a-1: 'jug pa 'di ni 'dod pas log par g-yem pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0287_H0289:176a-2: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i 'bras bu chung bar 'gyur ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10D0287_H0289:176a-4: rjes su yi rang bar mi byed /
K10D0287_H0289:176a-5: gzhan 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'ang phyir zlog par byed /
K10D0287_H0289:176a-8: las kyi mjug dang bral ba'i sems yin zhing tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:176a-9: 'di ni 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i 'bras bu
K10D0287_H0289:176a-10: chung bar 'gyur zhing myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges
K10D0287_H0289:176a-11: pa yin no // lus kyi chad pa rnam pa
K10D0287_H0289:176a-12: gsum po de dag ni 'bras bu chung ba dang
K10D0287_H0289:176a-14: de dag ni nga'i nyan thos sam /
K10D0287_H0289:176a-15: nga las thos nas las dang /
K10D0287_H0289:176a-16: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes shing gzhan gyis kha drang du mi rung ba /
K10D0287_H0289:176a-17: gzhan la rag ma lus par ma gtogs pa /
K10D0287_H0289:176a-18: gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa kun tu rgyu ba rnams sam /

K10D0287_H0289:186a-8: pas tshig brjod pa ni phra ma yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:186a-10: pha rol dang sbyor ba dang; mi sbyor ba'o //
K10D0287_H0289:186a-11: de la khyod kyis mi gnyis dang dbye ba'i sbyor ba gyis shig ces dgra'am /
K10D0287_H0289:186a-12: dgra chung du gzhan dag gis sbyor ba byed pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:186a-15: tshig rtsub po ji lta bu yin /
K10D0287_H0289:186a-16: rnam pa du yod ce na /
K10D0287_H0289:186a-17: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi
K10D0287_H0289:186a-18: rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las
K10D0287_H0289:186a-21: tshig rtsub po zhes bya ba ni bdag dang /
K10D0287_H0289:186a-22: gzhan la gnod pa byed pa /
K10D0287_H0289:186a-23: khro bo'i rgyu mthun par gyur pa /
K10D0287_H0289:186a-26: mi dga' ba'i tshig brjod pa nyan pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:186a-31: byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang lhan
K10D0287_H0289:186a-32: cig spyod pa'i tshig smra ba 'di ni tshig rtsub
K10D0287_H0289:186a-37: sems kyi kun nas ldang ba du ma /
K10D0287_H0289:186a-38: rnam par smin pa du ma /
K10D0287_H0289:186a-39: bde 'gror 'gro ba rnam par 'jig pa du ma /
K10D0287_H0289:186a-40: skye bo thams cad mi dga' bar byed pa /
K10D0287_H0289:186b-0: 'jig rten ldang @186b ba'i rgyur gyur pa /
K10D0287_H0289:186b-1: mthun par gyur pa rnam par 'jig par byed pa /
K10D0287_H0289:186b-2: yid mi ches pa'i gnas su gyur pa /
K10D0287_H0289:186b-3: yid gcugs pa ma yin pa /
K10D0287_H0289:186b-4: lce dug lta bur gyur pa'i tshig rtsub po dag
K10D0287_H0289:186b-5: gi dri ma ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pas
K10D0287_H0289:186b-6: rnam par spangs pa yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-8: brtan pas tshig rtsub spang bya zhing //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-9: rtag tu yang dag tshig smos shig /
K10D0287_H0289:186b-10: tshig snyan mngon par dga' ba'i mi //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-11: mya ngan 'das la nye bar gnas //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-12: tshig ni rtag tu smra bya zhing //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-13: dri ma yod pa rnam par spang //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-14: tshig gi dri mas zil non pa //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-15: mi gang de ni dmyal bar 'gro /
K10D0287_H0289:186b-16: tshig gi dri mas zil non pa //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-17: gang yin de la bde ba med //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-18: seng ge sbrul ni 'phags min ltar //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-19: de dag la ni mtho ris med //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-20: gang dag tshig rtsub mi smra zhing //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-21: gang dag g-yo ni rnam spangs pa //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-22: de dag thams cad dga' bskyed cing //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-23: bde ba dag dang dbugs 'byin cing //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-25: dga' zhing pha rol mtho ris 'gro //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-26: de 'dra ba yi mi dag ni //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-27: mkhas pa de la phyag byar 'os //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-28: bden tshig rtag tu zhi ba dang //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-29: g-yo sgyu med cing drang po'i sems //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-30: gzhan la gnod pa'i byed dang bral //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-31: de ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dga'//
K10D0287_H0289:186b-32: lag pa brdabs pa'i sga lta bur //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-33: mi ni chung bar gyur pa yin //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-34: gang dag de thob chos mi shes //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-35: mi ni rmongs pa dag gis bslus //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-36: gang dag bdag sdug mi 'gyur dang //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-37: gang dag bde ba mi 'dod pa //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-38: de ni sdig gi las byed cing //
K10D0287_H0289:186b-39: srid pa'i rgyu yis rnam par bslus //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-2: nor dang bu dang chung ma dang //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-3: mdza' bshes nye du gnyen 'dab dang //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-4: der ni 'gro bar mi nus so //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-5: legs par byas dang nyes par byas; ;de dag 'gro ba'i rjes su 'gro //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-6: mkha' la bya dag gnas pa yin //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-7: de grib lhan cig 'gro ba bzhin //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-8: ji ltar lam rgyags nyung ba dag /
K10D0287_H0289:187a-9: lam zhugs sdug bsngal 'gro ba ltar //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-10: de bzhin las bzang ma byas pa'i //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-12: ji ltar lam rgyags mang bdog pa //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-13: lam zhugs bde bar 'gro ba ltar //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-14: de bzhin las bzang byas pa yi //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-16: yun ring yul gzhan gnas pa yi //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-17: mi dag bde bar 'ongs pa dang //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-18: gnyen dang sdug pa mdza' bshes dag /
K10D0287_H0289:187a-20: de bzhin bsod nams byas pa'i mi //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-22: bsod nams nyid kyis mngon dga' ste //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-23: gnyen sdug dag ni 'ongs pa bzhin //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-24: de lta bas na tshe phyi ma'i //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-25: bsod nams dag ni bya zhing bsags //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-26: bsod nams 'jig rten pha rol tu //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-27: srog chags rnams ni dran gnas yin //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-28: spyod pa mthun par gang spyod pa'i //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-29: bsod nams dag la lha bstod cing //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-30: de dag 'dir ni mngon dga' la //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-31: pha rol mtho ris dga' bar 'gyur //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-32: gnas 'di gzhan gyis mthong ba yi //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-33: mkhas pa dag gis tshul khrims bsrungs //
K10D0287_H0289:187a-34: 'phags pa mthong pa phun sum tshogs //
K10D0287_H0289:187b-2: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi
K10D0287_H0289:187b-3: rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de mi dge ba'i
K10D0287_H0289:187b-4: las kyi lam gyi tshig bzhi pa'i tshig kyal pa
K10D0287_H0289:187b-6: de la tshig kyal pa rnam pa du yod ce na /
K10D0287_H0289:187b-7: tshig 'byung ba snga phyi 'brel pa med pa'i tshig kyal pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:187b-8: sems 'jug pa yang bas snga phyi 'brel pa med pa'i tshig brjod pa'i tshig kyal pa'o //
K10D0287_H0289:187b-11: rgyags pa med pa'i dus kyis bslang ba'ang byed pa'i
K10D0287_H0289:187b-12: rgyu'i ngo bo skyed pa de tshe 'di la yid
K10D0287_H0289:187b-13: gcugs pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur zhing tshe 'di'i las
K10D0287_H0289:187b-14: kyi lam skyed pa 'jig rten pa kun gyis smad
K10D0287_H0289:187b-16: don med par smra ba ni tshig kyal pa ste /
K10D0287_H0289:187b-17: tshig gi dri ma bzhi pa 'di ni mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bskyed pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:187b-18: skye bar byed pa smra bar mi bya zhing rjes
K10D0287_H0289:187b-19: su yi rang bar mi bya ba la gzhan gyi
K10D0287_H0289:187b-20: tshig kyal pa smra ba de la gnas par mi
K10D0287_H0289:187b-21: bya'o // yid kyi mi dge ba'i las kyi lam ni brnab sems dang /
K10D0287_H0289:187b-24: de la brnab sems ni gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'i nor rdzas dang /
K10D0287_H0289:187b-25: nor rdzas kyi rnam pa la ngag dang /
K10D0287_H0289:187b-26: yid kyis shin tu rtog par byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:187b-27: 'di ni bdag gir bya'o snyam pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed cing /
K10D0287_H0289:187b-28: de gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la 'phral la sems ldang ste /
K10D0287_H0289:187b-29: don la 'chums pa rgyu med pa yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:187b-30: de ni brnab sems yid kyi mi dge ba'i las kyi lam yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:188a-3: yid du mi 'ong ba'i rnam par smin pa /
K10D0287_H0289:188a-5: ma sbyangs pa'i byis pa skye bo brnab sems kyis
K10D0287_H0289:188a-6: rab tu bslus pa de gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs
K10D0287_H0289:188a-7: pa la 'phral la yid kyis shin tu rtog par
K10D0287_H0289:188a-13: rtag tu dga' bar byed cing gzhan gyi nor rdzas
K10D0287_H0289:188a-14: phun sum tshogs pa mthong na sdug bsngal ba yin
K10D0287_H0289:188a-15: no // 'di ni brnab sems zhes bya ste /
K10D0287_H0289:188a-16: yid kyi mi dge ba'i las kyi lam gyi dri ma chen po yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:188a-17: gzhan yang sems las byung ba gnod sems mi dge
K10D0287_H0289:188a-18: ba'i las kyi lam la sogs pa ji lta bu
K10D0287_H0289:188a-19: yin zhe na / rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi
K10D0287_H0289:188a-20: chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa
K10D0287_H0289:188a-21: yin zhe na / des / thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10D0287_H0289:188a-23: gzhan dag gis sgyu ma yin pa yid kyi nyes pa'i gnod sems dang /
K10D0287_H0289:188a-24: gzhan dag gi phun sum tshogs pa'am /
K10D0287_H0289:188a-25: phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa mthong nas; sgyu
K10D0287_H0289:188a-26: ma yin pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin byas pa
K10D0287_H0289:188a-27: yid kyi nyes pa mi bzad pa chen po skye
K10D0287_H0289:188a-28: bar 'gyur te / gnod sems de ni sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur /
K10D0287_H0289:188a-29: dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog tu gyur pa rnams kyi ser ba /
K10D0287_H0289:188a-30: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi mig gi mi mthun
K10D0287_H0289:188a-31: par gyur pa mun nag snying la gnas pa'i me
K10D0287_H0289:188a-32: de tshul khrims thams cad sreg par byed pa /
K10D0287_H0289:188b-0: mdog ngan pa'i @188b rgyu; chos kyi stegs gcod par byed pa /
K10D0287_H0289:188b-2: 'jig rten pha rol gyi dgra nang du zhugs pa /
K10D0287_H0289:188b-3: sems rtse gcig pa nyad 'jig par byed pa /
K10D0287_H0289:188b-4: byams pa dang mi mthun zhing /
K10D0287_H0289:188b-5: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /
K10D0287_H0289:188b-8: 'gog pa rnams 'jig par byed pa yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:188b-9: gnod sems zhes bya ba sems can dmyal ba'i pho nya mchog yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:188b-10: de skyes bu dam pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:188b-12: thos pa don du gnyer ba rnams kyis spong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0287_H0289:188b-14: log par lta ba dam pa'i chos kyi mi mthun
K10D0287_H0289:188b-15: par gyur pa de lta ba ngan pa thams cad
K10D0287_H0289:188b-16: kyi mun gnag snying la yang dag par skye bar
K10D0287_H0289:188b-17: 'gyur ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10D0287_H0289:188b-18: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi
K10D0287_H0289:188b-19: rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las
K10D0287_H0289:188b-22: thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs shing skyes pa /
K10D0287_H0289:188b-26: mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa /
K10D0287_H0289:188b-27: lta ba ngan pa la mngon par dga' ba /
K10D0287_H0289:188b-28: yang dag pa'i lam gyi mi mthun par gyur pa /
K10D0287_H0289:188b-33: skye bo thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa /
K10D0287_H0289:188b-34: phyin ci log tu lta zhing log par lta ba yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:188b-39: de la rkyen yod pa ni bde ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:189a-0: sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag @189a *//
K10D0287_H0289:189a-1: ni de dag nyid kyis byas kyi /
K10D0287_H0289:189a-3: 'bras bus byas pa ni ma yin no zhes zer ro //
K10D0287_H0289:189a-4: las dang 'bras bu la skur ba 'debs pa ni /
K10D0287_H0289:189a-5: sbyin pa med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
K10D0287_H0289:189a-6: de ltar de dag log par lta ba mi dge
K10D0287_H0289:189a-7: ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag thams cad don
K10D0287_H0289:189a-8: thams cad med par byed pa'i rtsa ba yin no
K10D0287_H0289:189a-9: //// 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10D0287_H0289:189a-12: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag bzlog nas /
K10D0287_H0289:189a-13: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:189a-14: zag pa med pa dag gi las byed par 'gyur ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10D0287_H0289:189a-15: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi
K10D0287_H0289:189a-16: rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las
K10D0287_H0289:189a-23: thar pa'i rgyu'i dngos po ni dge ba yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:189a-24: de la srog gcod pa spangs pas 'khor bar gtogs
K10D0287_H0289:189a-25: pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par
K10D0287_H0289:189a-26: 'gyur te / de'i tshe 'di nyid la bsngags par 'gyur /
K10D0287_H0289:189a-29: tshe ring por 'gyur ba'i las byed par 'gyur /
K10D0287_H0289:189a-33: gzhan yang sems can 'tshe bar byed pa de dag kyang nyin mtshan du srung bar byed /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-0: phyi bzhin du lha dag @189b kyang mngon par srung bar byed la /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-1: lus dang bral nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-2: gal te rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myong bar 'dod na'ang /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-3: ji ltar brtson 'grus brtsams pa bzhin myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0287_H0289:189b-4: gal te byang chub kyi lam tha ma dang /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-6: chen po rnams kyi so so yang dag par myong bar 'dod na /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-7: de rnam pa gsum po 'dir 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-8: gal te nyan thos kyi byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-9: de dgra bcom par gyur nas /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-11: gal te byang chub 'bring du yongs su bsngo na /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-12: de rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K10D0287_H0289:189b-13: gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-14: de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-18: 'jig rten mkhyen pa; skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro //
K10D0287_H0289:189b-23: chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni srog yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-24: gang srog de mngon par srung ba des ni bde ba thams cad sbyin par 'gyur la /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-25: sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-27: sems las byung ba so sor bsgoms pa srog byin pa'o //
K10D0287_H0289:189b-28: tshul khrims kyi nang na mtho ris su skye ba'i mchog ni 'di yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:189b-30: srog byin pa'i tshul khrims so //
K10D0287_H0289:189b-31: gal te yul gyi bde ba kun nas nyon mongs
K10D0287_H0289:189b-32: pa sred pa'i rgyur gyur par yongs su bsngo na
K10D0287_H0289:190a-4: gal te mi'i bdag nyid chen por yongs su bsngo na /
K10D0287_H0289:190a-5: de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa /
K10D0287_H0289:190a-7: gal te lha ma yin gyi bdag nyid chen por yongs su bsngo na /
K10D0287_H0289:190a-8: de lha ma yin gyi rgyal srid byed par 'gyur /
K10D0287_H0289:190a-9: gal te gnod sbyin gyi bdag nyid chen por yongs su bsngo na /
K10D0287_H0289:190a-10: de gnod sbyin gyi rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0287_H0289:190a-11: snying rje chen po 'di ni dam pa'i chos kyi sa bon du gyur pa /
K10D0287_H0289:190a-13: 'khor ba'i mun gnag tu zhugs pa rnams kyi sgron mar gyur pa yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:190a-15: srog gcod pa spong ba zhes bya'o //
K10D0287_H0289:190a-16: srog gcod pa spangs pa byams pa bsgoms par 'gyur zhing /
K10D0287_H0289:190a-17: snying rje'i rgyud la gnas pa yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:190a-18: bsams nas srog gcod pa spangs na gtsang zhing dga' bar 'gyur /
K10D0287_H0289:190a-19: gang gi tshe pha rol yang dag par bsrung bar
K10D0287_H0289:190a-20: ma nus pa de'i tshe btang snyoms su 'gyur zhing
K10D0287_H0289:190a-21: / de tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa'i rgyud du 'gyur /
K10D0287_H0289:190a-22: srog gcod pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying po ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
K10D0287_H0289:190a-24: gang gis ji lta ji ltar yongs su bsngo ba de lta de ltar yongs su 'grub bo //
K10D0287_H0289:190a-26: gser mgar mkhas pa de ni gser bzang po blangs nas /
K10D0287_H0289:190a-27: ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar gser de la byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:190b-0: de las mi'i gzugs @190b sam; de las sangs rgyas kyis gzugs byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:190b-1: de bzhin du srog gcod pa yang dag par bsrungs te /
K10D0287_H0289:190b-2: ma nyams shing ma ral la /
K10D0287_H0289:190b-3: ma zhig na ji lta ji ltar yongs su bsngo ba de lta de ltar yongs su 'grub bo //
K10D0287_H0289:190b-4: de lta bas na srog gcod pa spangs pa'i sems
K10D0287_H0289:190b-5: can gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das
K10D0287_H0289:190b-6: pa dang / nye bar gnas shing /
K10D0287_H0289:190b-7: de dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang dag par spyod /
K10D0287_H0289:190b-9: gzhan la phan pa'i skal pa dang ldan zhing /
K10D0287_H0289:190b-10: de sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:190b-12: yi dvags rnams kyi 'gro ba la bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa yin /
K10D0287_H0289:190b-13: des 'khor ba na chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa /
K10D0287_H0289:190b-14: chos dang ldan pa'i kun rtog pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur zhing /
K10D0287_H0289:190b-20: thun mong ma yin par 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:190b-21: bdag nyid nye bar spyod par 'gyur ro //
K10D0287_H0289:190b-22: chos dang ldan pa'i 'gran zla gzhan dag gis mi non par mthong ste /

K10D0287_H0289:200b-16: gzhan la mi gnod pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:200b-17: skye bo thams cad dga' ba ni khyim bdag rin po che yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:200b-18: de ltar rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang
K10D0287_H0289:200b-19: ldan pa ni mi'i gnas bzhi rnams la sgo bar
K10D0287_H0289:200b-23: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi dbang po'i stan phyed 'phrog pa yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:200b-24: de ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:200b-25: de'i nye ba'i rin po che sna bdun ni rin
K10D0287_H0289:200b-26: po che de dag las cung zad dman pa yin
K10D0287_H0289:200b-28: ral gri nye ba'i rin po che dang /
K10D0287_H0289:200b-29: pags pa nye ba'i rin po che dang /
K10D0287_H0289:200b-30: mal cha nye ba'i rin po che dang /
K10D0287_H0289:200b-31: tshal nye ba'i rin po che dang /
K10D0287_H0289:200b-32: khyim nye ba'i rin po che dang /
K10D0287_H0289:200b-33: gos nye ba'i rin po che dang /
K10D0287_H0289:200b-34: lham nye ba'i rin po che'o //
K10D0287_H0289:200b-35: de la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i ral gri nye ba'i rin po che'i yon tan ni /
K10D0287_H0289:200b-37: yul 'khor gang dag rgyal po'i yid dang /
K10D0287_H0289:201a-0: tshig las 'gal ba byed 'dod pa de @201a *//
K10D0287_H0289:201a-1: ral gri nye ba'i rin po che 'gro ste /
K10D0287_H0289:201a-2: des btab pa med cing ral gri rin po ches
K10D0287_H0289:201a-3: su la'ang btab pa med kyis kyang yul 'khor kun
K10D0287_H0289:201a-4: gyis mthong nas 'dud par byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:201a-5: nye ba'i rin po che de'i yon tan ni 'di yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:201a-7: chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med kyang
K10D0287_H0289:201a-8: yul 'khor de dag thams cad 'dud par byed de
K10D0287_H0289:201a-9: / 'di ni ral gri nye ba'i rin po che'i yon tan yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:201a-10: pags pa nye ba'i rin po che'i yon tan ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10D0287_H0289:201a-11: pags pa rin po che ni rgya mtsho nas 'byung ste /
K10D0287_H0289:201a-12: de byung bar gyur pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:201a-13: tshong ba dag gis rgyal po la 'bul bar byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:201a-14: de'i yon tan ni 'di dag yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:201a-15: de rgya mtsho'i klu'i pags pa yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:201a-16: zheng du dpag tshad lnga la chur dpag tshad bcu ste /
K10D0287_H0289:201a-20: grang na dro bar byed cing /
K10D0287_H0289:201a-21: dro na bde ba bsil bar byed la /
K10D0287_H0289:201a-22: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa
K10D0287_H0289:201a-23: gang du 'gro ba der blon po rin po ches
K10D0287_H0289:201a-25: ji ltar so so nas byed pa ltar de rgyal
K10D0287_H0289:201a-26: po'i 'khor gyi khyim gyi bya ba thams cad byed
K10D0287_H0289:201a-27: do // bud med mi sdug pa dag mi mthong
K10D0287_H0289:201a-28: zhing dkar ba de dang ldan par 'gyur la zla
K10D0287_H0289:201a-29: do // ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od snang ba de dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10D0287_H0289:201a-30: gsum pa rgyal po'i mal cha rin po che ni yang zhing 'jam la mtho dma' can yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:201a-31: de'i rgyu mtshan ni bteg na 'phar ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:201b-0: mnan na @201b nam byed pa yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:201b-1: gal te bsam gtan sems na de'i bsam gtan rnam par grol zhing blo gros gsal bar byed /
K10D0287_H0289:201b-2: gal te 'dod chags kyis zil gyis non pa yin na de mal cha'i steng du 'dug na /
K10D0287_H0289:201b-3: de'i tshe 'dod chags dang bral zhing chags pa med par byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:201b-5: gti mug dag la'ang de bzhin te /
K10D0287_H0289:201b-6: mal cha nye ba'i rin po che ni bsam gtan gyi gnas dang 'dra'o //
K10D0287_H0289:201b-7: rgyal po mal cha rin po che'i nang na 'dug
K10D0287_H0289:201b-8: pa bud med kyis mthong la de'i tshe mchog tu
K10D0287_H0289:201b-9: dga' ba skyes kyang yid la shin tu 'dod chags
K10D0287_H0289:201b-11: gsum pa 'di ni mal cha nye ba'i rin po che'i yon tan yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:201b-12: bzhi pa tshal nye ba'i rin po che yon tan du yod ce na /
K10D0287_H0289:201b-14: gal te rgyal po tshal du bsam gtan la dga' bar 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:201b-15: de der nye bar 'gro na tshal de'i mthu dang /
K10D0287_H0289:201b-16: rgyal po'i dge ba'i las kyis gang lha'i 'jig rten
K10D0287_H0289:201b-17: gyi tshal gyi dga' ba'i rnam pa me tog dang
K10D0287_H0289:201b-21: 'bab pa'i chu ngogs bde ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:201b-22: lha'i bu mo dag rol mo byed cing /
K10D0287_H0289:201b-23: dgod la mdzes pa rtse ba de dag thams cad
K10D0287_H0289:201b-24: lha'i ris de nas tshal der nye bar 'ong ste
K10D0287_H0289:201b-25: / rgyal po de'ang lha bzhin du lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag dang ldan par 'gyur /
K10D0287_H0289:201b-26: tshal nye ba'i rin po che der bud med dang
K10D0287_H0289:201b-27: lhan cig shin tu dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod par
K10D0287_H0289:202a-0: byed de / dge ba'i las kyi rnal 'byor spyod pa de bzhi @202a *//
K10D0287_H0289:202a-1: pa tshal nye ba'i rin po che mthong nas gnas so //
K10D0287_H0289:202a-2: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i khyim nye ba'i rin po che ji lta bu yin /
K10D0287_H0289:202a-3: yon tan ni du zhig dang ldan zhe na; 'di lta ste /
K10D0287_H0289:202a-4: gang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i khyim nye ba'i rin po che'i nang du nyal bar gyur na /
K10D0287_H0289:202a-5: mtshan mo nyal ba de'i tshe zla ba lta bar 'dod na 'ong zhing gza' dang /
K10D0287_H0289:202a-6: rgyu skar dang; skar mda' dag kyang de'i khyim der nye bar 'ong bar 'gyur /
K10D0287_H0289:202a-7: de'i nor bu'ang mthong na dga' bar 'gyur /
K10D0287_H0289:202a-8: lha mo dag kyang lha'i rol mo byed par 'gyur /
K10D0287_H0289:202a-9: gang mya ngan mang po dang bral ba'i mi de bde bar gnyid log par 'gyur /
K10D0287_H0289:202a-10: gnyid log pa na rmi lam dge ba mchog tu dga' ba dag mthong bar 'gyur /
K10D0287_H0289:202a-11: grang ba'i dus su ni rlung dro ba ldang zhing /
K10D0287_H0289:202a-12: dro ba'i dus su rlung bsil ba reg na bde zhing 'jam pa ldang ngo //
K10D0287_H0289:202a-13: mtshan mo thun gsum las thun gnyis la nyal zhing
K10D0287_H0289:202a-14: thun gsum pa las gnyid dang bral nas langs te
K10D0287_H0289:202a-15: / bde ba'i chos la gnas par 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:202a-16: 'di ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i khyim nye bar rin po che yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:202a-17: gos rin po che rnam pa du yod /
K10D0287_H0289:202a-18: yon tan ni du zhig dang ldan zhe na /
K10D0287_H0289:202a-20: thags bzang zhing mchog tu 'jam la dri mas ma gos pa yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:202a-27: dub pa'i gnod pa med la /
K10D0287_H0289:202b-0: me dang @202b mtshon dag gis bsreg pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:202b-3: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i lha ma nye bar rin po che ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10D0287_H0289:202b-4: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi
K10D0287_H0289:202b-5: rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las
K10D0287_H0289:202b-7: lha'i mig gis brtags na lham nye ba'i rin po
K10D0287_H0289:202b-8: che 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rkang pa la gyon na
K10D0287_H0289:202b-9: ji ltar skam sa la rkang pa mi 'bying ba
K10D0287_H0289:202b-10: de bzhin du chu la'ang mi 'bying bar 'gyur ro
K10D0287_H0289:202b-11: // gal te dal gyis sngon du 'gro bar 'dod
K10D0287_H0289:202b-12: na dpag tshad brgyar yang 'gro bar 'gyur zhing lus
K10D0287_H0289:202b-14: 'di dag ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang /
K10D0287_H0289:202b-15: nye ba'i rin po che sna bdun dag la spyod pa yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:202b-17: lha'i rigs gnyis la nye bar spyod pa yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:202b-18: de'i bu dpa' zhing rtul phod la pha rol gyi
K10D0287_H0289:202b-19: sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tham pa yod de
K10D0287_H0289:202b-20: / de dag 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la phyag byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:202b-21: gnod sems mi dge ba'i las spangs pa ni dge
K10D0287_H0289:202b-22: ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi rgyu mthun pa bde
K10D0287_H0289:202b-23: ba de dag myong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0287_H0289:202b-25: 'khor ba thams cad kyi sa bon du gyur pa /
K10D0287_H0289:202b-26: thog ma med pa'i dus nas mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa /
K10D0287_H0289:202b-27: yang dag par sbyor ba thams cad kyi bag la
K10D0287_H0289:202b-28: nyal du gyur pa log par lta ba spangs pa
K10D0287_H0289:202b-30: yang dag pa'i lta bas 'khor ba las grol ba ji lta bu yin zhe na /
K10D0287_H0289:203a-1: chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las byung ba'i shes pa'am /
K10D0287_H0289:203a-3: rnal 'byor spyod pa des chos la chos kyi rjes
K10D0287_H0289:203a-4: su mthong ba ni 'di la log par lta ba
K10D0287_H0289:203a-5: spangs shing / de'i yang dag pa'i lta bas don med pa thams cad spangs la /
K10D0287_H0289:203a-6: yang dag pa'i sbyor ba'i bag la nyal 'dor bar 'gyur /
K10D0287_H0289:203a-7: de mya ngan las 'das pa nye bar 'gyur zhing 'khor ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:203a-9: 'di la log par lta ba rnam pa lnga mthong
K10D0287_H0289:203a-10: nas dbang po lnga bsgrubs par 'gyur ba ni skyes
K10D0287_H0289:203a-11: bu dam pa dam pa'i chos la mngon par dga'
K10D0287_H0289:203a-12: ba de thog ma nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0287_H0289:203a-13: yon tan de dag rnar thos nas de'i tshe 'di
K10D0287_H0289:203a-14: ltar 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs la
K10D0287_H0289:203a-15: dmigs shing 'gro ba lnga rnams la 'jigs pa chen
K10D0287_H0289:203a-17: lha rnams la bag med pas 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10D0287_H0289:203a-18: mi rnams la 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
K10D0287_H0289:203a-19: sems can dmyal ba rnams la gnod pa'i sdug bsngal dang; yi dvags rnams la bkres pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:203a-21: dud 'gro rnams la gcig la gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal te /
K10D0287_H0289:203a-22: de ltar rnam pa lnga po de dag rnam pa
K10D0287_H0289:203a-23: du ma yod cing sdug bsngal gyi yan lag dbye
K10D0287_H0289:203a-24: ba dag dpag tu med par dmigs so //
K10D0287_H0289:203a-25: de'i tshe 'di ltar thog ma nyid du 'khor ba
K10D0287_H0289:203a-26: thams cad las nges par byung bar gyur cing snang
K10D0287_H0289:203b-0: bar gyur la dam pa'i chos nges @203b par 'byed
K10D0287_H0289:203b-1: pa'i cha lam rab tu 'byung bar sems bskyed de
K10D0287_H0289:203b-2: / de'i sems bskyed pa gcig las dge ba'i chos kyi rgyun nyid skye'o //
K10D0287_H0289:203b-3: gang gis de'i sems bskyed pa de dang yang dag
K10D0287_H0289:203b-4: par ldan pa la bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod
K10D0287_H0289:203b-5: sbyin rab tu mgu zhing kun tu dga' la rab
K10D0287_H0289:203b-6: tu dga' ste / sems rangs par gyur nas yid
K10D0287_H0289:203b-7: la rigs kyi bu 'di ming ni 'di zhes bya
K10D0287_H0289:203b-8: tu dga' ste / / rigs ni 'di zhes bya ste /
K10D0287_H0289:203b-9: de thog ma med pa'i dus nas 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams spong bar 'dod la /
K10D0287_H0289:203b-10: bdud kyi yul gyi dngos po mi 'dod par zhugs pa /
K10D0287_H0289:203b-11: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i yul dag gis dga' pa'i
K10D0287_H0289:203b-12: 'dod chags kyi mod las skyes pa'i sred pa dag
K10D0287_H0289:203b-13: la kun tu mi dga' ba yin no snyam mo
K10D0287_H0289:203b-15: log par lta ba dang bral ba'i rigs kyi bu
K10D0287_H0289:203b-16: de ni de ltar rtag tu rab tu 'byung ba'i
K10D0287_H0289:203b-17: sems kun tu bsten par byed cing goms par byed
K10D0287_H0289:203b-19: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur byed /
K10D0287_H0289:203b-20: dam pa'i chos nyan pa la dga' bar 'gyur /
K10D0287_H0289:203b-21: sangs rgyas kyi chos la phyir zhing sems gsal la phyag 'tshal bar byed /
K10D0287_H0289:203b-23: ngag gi las kyi mtha' zhi zhing shin tu gsal ba yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:203b-26: yid zhi bas nyin mo mnyam par bzhag par bar
K10D0287_H0289:203b-27: snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin gyis rig nas kun
K10D0287_H0289:203b-29: rigs kyi bu 'di dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sems
K10D0287_H0289:203b-30: rab tu dang zhing khyim gyi gnas gzeb lta bur
K10D0287_H0289:204a-2: des bdud kyi yul rnams la thog ma med pa'i
K10D0287_H0289:204a-3: dus nas zhugs pa'i 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
K10D0287_H0289:204a-4: dag gis 'dod pa'i lha dang lhan cig tu 'du
K10D0287_H0289:204a-5: shes dag la chags pa med cing bdud dang lhan
K10D0287_H0289:204a-7: nyon mongs pa spong bar 'dod pa de bar snang
K10D0287_H0289:204a-8: la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin gyis rig nas kun tu
K10D0287_H0289:204a-11: rigs kyi bu de de ltar 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
K10D0287_H0289:204a-12: la dmigs nas ches shin tu rab tu 'byung ba'i
K10D0287_H0289:204a-15: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:204a-16: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:204a-19: brdzun du smra ba spangs nas sdom pa len par 'gyur ro //
K10D0287_H0289:204a-20: de gang gi tshe dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa rdzogs par spyod par 'gyur bag de'i tshe /
K10D0287_H0289:204a-21: bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin kun tu dga' ste /
K10D0287_H0289:204a-22: rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig ming 'di zhes bya /
K10D0287_H0289:204a-23: rus ni 'di zhes bya ba grong khyer che ge mo zhig dang /
K10D0287_H0289:204a-24: grong rdal ga ge mo zhig dang /
K10D0287_H0289:204a-25: yul ga ge mo zhig tu skra dang /
K10D0287_H0289:204a-26: kha spu bregs te chos gos ngur smrig bgos nas
K10D0287_H0289:204a-27: yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par
K10D0287_H0289:204a-29: bdud kyi phyogs ni dams par byed cing /
K10D0287_H0289:204a-30: dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs ni mtho bar byed /
K10D0287_H0289:204a-31: bdud kyi 'ching ba ni rnam par gcod par byed
K10D0287_H0289:204a-32: cing nyon mongs pa chen po 'dod chags zhe sdang
K10D0287_H0289:204a-33: gti mug las grol bar byed do zhes mngon par
K10D0287_H0289:204b-0: sgrogs so // log @204b par lta ba ni kun
K10D0287_H0289:204b-1: tu sbyor ba'i bag la nyal thams cad kyi gzhi
K10D0287_H0289:204b-2: sgrogs so // yin la / yang dag par lta
K10D0287_H0289:204b-3: ba ni mtha' mya ngan las 'das pa'i gzhi yin
K10D0287_H0289:204b-4: sgrogs so // yin la / te / rnal 'byor spyod pa bas chos de rjes su mthong ngo //
K10D0287_H0289:204b-5: de'i tshe 'di ltar thog ma nyid du yang dag
K10D0287_H0289:204b-6: pa'i lta ba la mngon par bstod par byed de
K10D0287_H0289:204b-7: / mi rgod mi smod skyon du mi 'grang la
K10D0287_H0289:204b-8: pha rol dag la bstod par byed cing rab tu
K10D0287_H0289:204b-9: 'jog par byed do; ;log par lta ba la smod
K10D0287_H0289:204b-10: / de / bstod par mi byed la smod par byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:204b-11: yang dag par lta bas ni log par lta ba las dang /
K10D0287_H0289:204b-13: rnam par smin pa yang dag par mngon par ston par byed cing 'jog par mi byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:204b-14: 'ching ba rnams kyi rtsa ba ni log par lta ba yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:204b-15: byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi 'ching ba yin zhing 'byung po rnams dang /
K10D0287_H0289:204b-18: yi dvags kyi yul du gnas pa'i mtha' yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:204b-19: rigs kyi bus de spangs na dge ba du ma de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0287_H0289:204b-21: rigs kyi bu de 'di ltar khyim gyi gnas ni
K10D0287_H0289:204b-22: sdug bsngal ba nyam nga ba 'ching bar gyur pa
K10D0287_H0289:204b-24: rang dbang med par rig nas khyim nas 'byung zhing
K10D0287_H0289:204b-25: rab tu 'byung bar 'dod la bdud dang lhan cig
K10D0287_H0289:204b-26: g-yul 'gyed par 'dod pa'i skyes bu dam pa des
K10D0287_H0289:204b-27: bla dang / bar snang la spyod pa'i lha dag gis rig nas kun tu dga' ste /
K10D0287_H0289:205a-0: rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams la kun tu dga' ba'i yid kyis rigs kyi @205a *//
K10D0287_H0289:205a-1: kyi bu 'di zhes bya ba grong che ge mo zhig dang /
K10D0287_H0289:205a-2: grong rdal mang ge mo zhig dang /
K10D0287_H0289:205a-3: yul ga ge mo zhig tu skra dang /
K10D0287_H0289:205a-5: gos ngur smrig bgos nas yang dag pa'i dad pa
K10D0287_H0289:205a-6: nyid kyis khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
K10D0287_H0289:205a-7: ngo // de khyim nas byung bas bdud kyi phyogs
K10D0287_H0289:205a-8: ni dams par byed cing dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs
K10D0287_H0289:205a-9: ni mngon par mtho bar byed do zhes mngon par
K10D0287_H0289:205a-10: ngo // bsnyad do // de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis sa bla dang /
K10D0287_H0289:205a-11: bar snang la spyod pa'i lha dag dang /
K10D0287_H0289:205a-12: gnod sbyin de dag las de skad thos nas yid
K10D0287_H0289:205a-13: dga' la bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin dag
K10D0287_H0289:205a-15: de ltar dzambu'i gling gi mi dam pa'i chos dge ba'i gtam gyis spro ba skyes nas /
K10D0287_H0289:205a-16: rigs kyi bu de ji ltar rigs par 'phags pa
K10D0287_H0289:205a-17: dge sbyong gi mkhan po la bsnyen bkur byed do

K10D0287_H0289:220b-2: te ngan na de'i tshe bum pa ma legs par

K10D0287_H0289:223b-9: dpa' bo dga' dang 'jigs mnyam pa //

K10D0287_H0289:223b-20: zhim pa'i ro la mi chags la //

K10D0287_H0289:223b-22: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10D0287_H0289:223b-23: btang snyoms snying rje dag la dga'//
K10D0287_H0289:223b-24: 'chab dang skyon ni rnam spangs shing //
K10D0287_H0289:223b-25: nyes pa'i rdzas kun nges bsregs pa //
K10D0287_H0289:223b-26: de lta bu ni dge slong yin //
K10D0287_H0289:223b-27: dge slong de nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes
K10D0287_H0289:223b-28: su lta zhing tshor ba de dag ji lta ba
K10D0287_H0289:223b-29: bzhin du rjes su rtog ste /

K10D0287_H0289:223b-31: te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i dmigs pa
K10D0287_H0289:223b-32: rjes su rgyu ba med par mthong ngo //
K10D0287_H0289:223b-33: dmigs pa gnyis pas lhan cig 'gag cing 'jig pa mthong ste /
K10D0287_H0289:223b-34: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
K10D0287_H0289:223b-35: ba'i dmigs pa 'das nas bdag sgra la dmigs pa
K10D0287_H0289:223b-36: dang bcas pa'i tshor ba sdug pa'am /
K10D0287_H0289:224a-0: @224a *// bdag gi sems de dang ldan cig gyur pa med do snyam nas /

K10D0287_H0289:224a-3: pa de 'gags nas sna'i tshor ba dri la dmigs
K10D0287_H0289:224a-4: pa skye ste / de sna'i tshor ba la'ang rtog par byed cing shin tu rtog par byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:224a-5: bdag gi sna'i tshor ba dri dang bcas pa dge ba'am /
K10D0287_H0289:224a-8: lung du ma bstan pa skye ste /
K10D0287_H0289:224a-9: bdag gi sna'i tshor ba de'i sems gyur pa gal
K10D0287_H0289:224a-10: te des sems gyur pa mthong na des yang dmigs
K10D0287_H0289:224a-11: pa de nyid la gom par byed cing spyod la
K10D0287_H0289:224a-12: 'bad cing brtson te las su rung bar byed la
K10D0287_H0289:224a-13: dge ba'i chos zag pa med pas sems goms par
K10D0287_H0289:224a-14: byed do // gal te mi g-yon lce'i dmigs pa dge ba'am /
K10D0287_H0289:224a-17: lung du ma bstan pa la dmigs par byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:224a-18: de dmigs pa de mngon sum du byas nas bde pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:224a-20: sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la lta
K10D0287_H0289:224a-21: bar byed cing ci 'dis bdag gi sems gyur tam
K10D0287_H0289:224a-22: snyam mo // gal te ro la dmigs pa'i tshor
K10D0287_H0289:224a-23: ba skyes pas sems gyur pa mthong na des yang
K10D0287_H0289:224a-24: sems dmigs pa'i ka ba la mos pa'i thag pas
K10D0287_H0289:224a-25: bcings nas ji ltar sems 'di lce'i tshor ba dang
K10D0287_H0289:224a-26: bcas shing sred pa dang bcas pas mi 'phrogs par
K10D0287_H0289:224b-0: bya snyam nas spyod cing 'bad @224b la nan tan
K10D0287_H0289:224b-1: snyam mo // du byed do //// 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
K10D0287_H0289:224b-4: dge slong de lus kyi reg bya dang bcas pa'i
K10D0287_H0289:224b-5: reg bya'i tshor pa dmigs pa'i ka ba la bcings
K10D0287_H0289:224b-8: lung du ma bstan pa la rtog par byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:224b-9: gal te de reg bya'i tshor ba des sems gyur
K10D0287_H0289:224b-10: par mthong na'ang ji ltar dmigs pa'i ka ba la
K10D0287_H0289:224b-11: bcings nas las su rung bar byed cing gyur pa
K10D0287_H0289:224b-12: med pa de ltar byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:224b-13: yang dge slong de yid la 'ongs pa'i yid dang /
K10D0287_H0289:224b-14: shin tu 'brel ba'i chos kyis tshor ba dge ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:224b-17: lung du ma bstan pa la lta bar byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:224b-18: gal te tshor ba de dag gis yid gyur na
K10D0287_H0289:224b-19: de dmigs pa'i ka ba de la mos pa'i thag
K10D0287_H0289:224b-20: pas bcings nas las su rung bar byed de gyur
K10D0287_H0289:224b-21: pa med pa de ltar byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:224b-22: yul drug lus la yod pa'i tshor ba la lta
K10D0287_H0289:224b-23: ba'i dge slong yang dag pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba
K10D0287_H0289:224b-24: dang / zad pa de nyid mthong ba ni gnas lnga pa la 'jug ste /
K10D0287_H0289:224b-25: de mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
K10D0287_H0289:224b-26: tshor ba shes pa'i sgron mas tshor ba myong bar
K10D0287_H0289:224b-27: byed pa'i tshor ba 'di dag gang zhig yin zhes
K10D0287_H0289:224b-28: rnam par rtog par byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:224b-29: de yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i tshor ba 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:224b-30: yid dang shin tu 'brel par mthong la /
K10D0287_H0289:224b-31: byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni yid
K10D0287_H0289:224b-32: kyi rnam par rtog pas 'phrogs shing shin tu rtog
K10D0287_H0289:225a-2: byed pa po ni gang yang med kyi /
K10D0287_H0289:225a-3: rgyu rkyen dang 'brel ba'i 'du byed kyi phung po 'di nyid skye /
K10D0287_H0289:225a-4: 'du byed kyi phung po 'di nyid 'gag go snyam mo //
K10D0287_H0289:225a-5: de mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
K10D0287_H0289:225a-6: tshor ba ji lta ba bzhin rjes su mthong zhing
K10D0287_H0289:225a-7: rjes su 'jug pa des sems mi 'phrogs shing rnam
K10D0287_H0289:225a-8: par mi g-yo la skyon du 'gyur bar mi byed
K10D0287_H0289:225a-9: de / dri ma can du mi byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:225a-10: yang dge slong de rna ba'i tshor ba la rtog par byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:225a-11: tshor ba rjes su myong zhing reg pa'i tshor ba 'di gang yin snyam mo //
K10D0287_H0289:225a-12: de rna ba'i tshor ba 'di yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang shin tu 'brel bar mthong ste /
K10D0287_H0289:225a-13: yid dang shin tu 'brel ba de la gnas par zad kyi /
K10D0287_H0289:225a-15: tshor ba po med cing rna ba'i tshor ba rten
K10D0287_H0289:225a-16: cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la byed pa po dang
K10D0287_H0289:225a-18: 'du byed kyi phung po stong pa 'di rgyu rkyen gyi dbang gis skye zhing 'gag go snyam mo //
K10D0287_H0289:225a-19: yang dge slong de sna'i tshor ba la rtog par byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:225a-20: tshor ba 'di myong zhing rig pa gang zhig yin snyam mo //
K10D0287_H0289:225a-21: de tshor ba yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang shin tu 'brel bar mthong ste /
K10D0287_H0289:225a-22: de la dmigs pa de la gnas pa de rgyu dang /
K10D0287_H0289:225a-23: rkyen las byung zhing rjes su myong ba'i mtshan nyid
K10D0287_H0289:225a-24: yin gyi 'du byed kyi phung po stong pa 'di
K10D0287_H0289:225a-25: byed pa pos gnas su ma byas shing tshor ba
K10D0287_H0289:225a-26: pos gnas su ma byas pa rgyun chags par 'jug
K10D0287_H0289:225b-1: de sna'i tshor ba rtogs nas byed pa po dang /
K10D0287_H0289:225b-2: tshor ba po med cing don gyi bar du gcod par gyur pa ni med do snyam mo //
K10D0287_H0289:225b-3: yang dge slong de lce'i tshor ba la rnam par rtog ste /
K10D0287_H0289:225b-4: lce'i tshor ba 'di myong zhing rig pa gang yin snyam mo //
K10D0287_H0289:225b-5: de lce'i tshor ba 'di yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang shin tu 'brel bar mthong ste /
K10D0287_H0289:225b-6: de la gnas pa de dang 'brel ba de la dmigs pa de'i rgyu las byung zhing /
K10D0287_H0289:225b-7: de la bsten pa yin gyi /
K10D0287_H0289:225b-10: don gyi bar du gcod par gyur pa med de /
K10D0287_H0289:225b-11: 'du byed kyi phung po stong pa 'di'i rgyu dang /
K10D0287_H0289:225b-12: rkyen gyi dbang gis skye'o snyam mo //
K10D0287_H0289:225b-13: yang dge slong de lus kyi reg bya'i tshor ba la rtog par byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:225b-14: lus kyi tshor ba myong zhing rig pa 'di gang yin snyam mo //
K10D0287_H0289:225b-15: de lus kyi tshor ba 'di yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang shin tu 'brel bar mthong ste /
K10D0287_H0289:225b-17: tshor ba po don gyi bar du gcod par 'gyur ba ni med de /
K10D0287_H0289:225b-18: de 'du byed kyi phung po stong pa 'di rgyu dang /
K10D0287_H0289:225b-19: rkyen gyi dbang gi 'jug go snyam mo; ;yang dge
K10D0287_H0289:225b-20: slong de yid kyi tshor ba la rnam par rtog
K10D0287_H0289:225b-21: par byed de / yid kyi tshor ba myong zhing rig pa 'di gang yin snyam mo //
K10D0287_H0289:225b-23: chos la bsten nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye bar mthong ste /
K10D0287_H0289:225b-24: gsum 'dus pa'i reg pa reg pa dang lhan cig byung ba'i tshor ba /
K10D0287_H0289:225b-26: rdzas dri zhim pa du ma bsdus pa las spos bzang po 'byung ngo //
K10D0287_H0289:226a-0: spos de'i rgyu mi 'byung ba gcig kyang @226a *//
K10D0287_H0289:226a-1: med pa de bzhin du rgyu dang /
K10D0287_H0289:226a-2: rkyen 'dus pa las tshor ba thams cad 'byung gi /
K10D0287_H0289:226a-3: byed pa pos gnas su ma byas shing tshor ba pos gnas su ma byas pa yin no //
K10D0287_H0289:226a-8: ze 'bru la'ang brten nas padma zhes bya ba'i me tog 'byung ste /
K10D0287_H0289:226a-9: padma de'i rgyu gcig kyang med do //
K10D0287_H0289:226a-10: de bzhin du dmigs pa la'ang brten /
K10D0287_H0289:226a-12: yid la byed pa la'ang brten /
K10D0287_H0289:226a-13: snang ba la'ang brten nas mig gi 'dus te reg
K10D0287_H0289:226a-14: pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'byung ste; mig las
K10D0287_H0289:226a-15: skyes pa / mig la brten pa'i tshor ba de rigs gcig pa ma yin /
K10D0287_H0289:226a-17: 'byung ba gcig ma yin zhing ther zug tu gnas
K10D0287_H0289:226a-18: pa ma yin la sprul pa lta bu yin no
K10D0287_H0289:226a-19: snyam mo // de ji lta ji ltar de nyid
K10D0287_H0289:226a-20: tshol ba'i dge slong de ni de lta de ltar
K10D0287_H0289:226a-21: de'i chos dkar po 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:226a-23: bu ram shing snod kyi nang du bcug nas mes
K10D0287_H0289:226a-24: bskol ba des de dang po zhu zhing dri mar
K10D0287_H0289:226a-25: 'gyur ba ni bu ram dri ma can zhes bya'o
K10D0287_H0289:226a-26: // lan gnyis su bskol ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:226a-27: dkar bar 'gyur zhing bu ram du shes so //
K10D0287_H0289:226a-28: lan gsum pa la shin tu dkar bar 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:226a-29: de ji lta ji ltar bu ram shing bskol ba
K10D0287_H0289:226a-30: de lta de ltar shin tu dri ma dang bral
K10D0287_H0289:226a-31: bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dge slong dmigs pa'i
K10D0287_H0289:226a-32: snod du ye shes me lta bus sems kyi rgyun
K10D0287_H0289:226b-0: @226b bu ram shing lta bu yongs su skol bar
K10D0287_H0289:226b-1: byed do // de'i dbu ba lta bu bsam gtan dang po thob par 'gyur zhing /
K10D0287_H0289:226b-2: de'i dkar ba lta bu bsam gtan gnyis pa thob par 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:226b-3: de bzhin du ji lta ji ltar dge slong gi
K10D0287_H0289:226b-4: sems kyi rgyun ye shes kyi mes skol bar byed
K10D0287_H0289:226b-5: pa de lta de ltar zag pa med pa'i chos
K10D0287_H0289:226b-6: shin tu dkar zhing shin tu dri ma med la
K10D0287_H0289:226b-7: shin tu skyon med par 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:226b-8: las phyir phyogs pa dri ma dang bral zhing dkar la dag pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0287_H0289:226b-10: dge slong de tshor ba de dag la shin tu
K10D0287_H0289:226b-11: rnam pa phra ba gzhan gyis rtog par byed de
K10D0287_H0289:226b-12: / sems can che ge mo zhig gi tshor ba
K10D0287_H0289:226b-13: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba phra
K10D0287_H0289:226b-14: / ba'am / rags pa dri ma can gti mug dang ldan pa skyes pa de /
K10D0287_H0289:226b-15: tshor ba rags pa che ge mo zhig gis bsal
K10D0287_H0289:226b-16: cing spangs te lhag ma dang bcas par byas so
K10D0287_H0289:226b-20: lus kyi tshor ba'ang de bzhin no //
K10D0287_H0289:226b-21: dge slong de de ltar brtson zhing spro la bdud kyi sde 'joms pa na /
K10D0287_H0289:226b-22: sa bla'i gnod sbyin dang; bar snang la spyod pa'i
K10D0287_H0289:226b-23: gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rgyal po chen po
K10D0287_H0289:226b-24: bzhi la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10D0287_H0289:226b-26: bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin de dag dang /
K10D0287_H0289:226b-27: rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis kyang
K10D0287_H0289:226b-28: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la mngon par bsnyad do
K10D0287_H0289:226b-29: // sa bla'i gnod sbyin de dag dang /
K10D0287_H0289:226b-30: bar snang la spyod pa'i gnod sbyin de dag dang /
K10D0287_H0289:227a-2: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha de dag gis kyang lha'i dbang po brgya byin la mngon par bsnyad do //
K10D0287_H0289:227a-3: lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang glang po che sa
K10D0287_H0289:227a-4: srung gi bu la zhen nas yid dga' bas 'thab
K10D0287_H0289:227a-5: bral gyi lha rnams la mngon par bsnyad de /
K10D0287_H0289:227a-7: 'thab bral gyi lha de dag kyang brgya byin la
K10D0287_H0289:227a-8: dga' nas rin po che sna tshogs thogs shing lus
K10D0287_H0289:227a-10: spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K10D0287_H0289:227a-14: dri yid du 'ong zhing bde ba dpe med pa /
K10D0287_H0289:227a-15: rab tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis dga' ldan gyi lha'i
K10D0287_H0289:227a-16: ris na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i
K10D0287_H0289:227a-17: khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang /
K10D0287_H0289:227a-18: grong khyer rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing dpag tshad stong phrag bzhi bcu yod pa /
K10D0287_H0289:227a-19: yid kyis brtags pa zhes bya ba der byang chub sems dpa'i khang bzang dpag tshad khri yod pa /
K10D0287_H0289:227a-20: zag pa med par 'gro ba zhes bya ba de
K10D0287_H0289:227a-21: na bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0287_H0289:227a-22: lnga brgya dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa de la
K10D0287_H0289:227a-23: 'thab bral gyi lha dag yid rab tu dga' bas
K10D0287_H0289:227a-24: gos phyogs gcig tu bgos te pus mo sa la
K10D0287_H0289:227a-25: btsugs / mgo btud thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba /
K10D0287_H0289:227a-26: lha; 'di ltar dzambu'i gling na las kyi sa la gnas pa /
K10D0287_H0289:227a-27: grong che ge mo zhig dang /
K10D0287_H0289:227a-28: grong rdal mang ge mo zhig dang /
K10D0287_H0289:227a-29: yul ga ge mo zhig tu rigs che ge mo
K10D0287_H0289:227a-30: zhig las rigs kyi bu che ge mo zhig skra
K10D0287_H0289:227b-1: gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
K10D0287_H0289:227b-2: de spyod pa la nan tan bgyid cing bla ma la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa /
K10D0287_H0289:227b-3: zag pa med pa'i chos kyi de nyid tshol zhing
K10D0287_H0289:227b-4: tshor ba'i de nyid mthong ba zhes bgyi ba sa
K10D0287_H0289:227b-5: gzhan bzhi pa la zhugs nas bdud kyi phyogs 'joms
K10D0287_H0289:227b-6: par bgyid cing dam pa'i chos kyi zam pa brtan
K10D0287_H0289:227b-7: par bgyid cing chos dkar po rab tu ston par
K10D0287_H0289:227b-8: bgyid cing bdud kyi phyogs smod par bgyid la lha'i
K10D0287_H0289:227b-9: phyogs 'phel bar bgyid pa de bdag cag gis lha
K10D0287_H0289:227b-10: rnams la mngon par gsol lo //
K10D0287_H0289:227b-11: 'thab bral gyi lha rnams la byams pas lha'i phyogs 'phel bar 'gyur ba de thos nas /
K10D0287_H0289:227b-13: 'di ltar gang bdud kyi phyogs dma' bar byed cing /
K10D0287_H0289:227b-14: dam pa'i chos kyi phyogs mngon par mtho bar byed la /
K10D0287_H0289:227b-15: nyon mongs pa rnams las rab tu grol bar byed
K10D0287_H0289:227b-16: pa'i bdud kyi sde rnam par 'jig par byed pa
K10D0287_H0289:227b-17: la bdag rab tu dga'o zhes gtam du byed do
K10D0287_H0289:227b-19: dge slong des tshor ba'i tshogs drug mdor bsdus pa
K10D0287_H0289:227b-20: ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas tshor ba'i phung po'i
K10D0287_H0289:227b-21: sa'i chos sa gzhan lnga pa la ji ltar 'dug
K10D0287_H0289:227b-22: ce na / rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos
K10D0287_H0289:227b-23: la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pas brtags
K10D0287_H0289:227b-24: ce na / na / yang dge slong de tshor
K10D0287_H0289:227b-25: ba'i de nyid mthong zhing tshor ba'i tshogs drug gi
K10D0287_H0289:227b-27: 'du shes kyi phung po yang dag par rab tu rnam par 'byed cing mtshan mar byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:228a-1: shes dang bcas pa gang yin snyam na /
K10D0287_H0289:228a-2: bdag chos dkar po dben pa la spyod cing phan pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:228a-3: mi phan pa las dben par spyod pa'i 'du shes
K10D0287_H0289:228a-4: kyis 'du shes su byed cing de yang dag par
K10D0287_H0289:228a-5: sems par byed la de chos dkar po mtshan mar
K10D0287_H0289:228a-6: byed pa ni 'di ltar thog ma nyid du chos
K10D0287_H0289:228a-7: rnams rab tu rnam par 'byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:228a-8: dmigs pa bstan du yod cing thogs pa dang bcas pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:228a-9: bstan du med cing thogs pa'i 'du shes ji ltar
K10D0287_H0289:228a-10: skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin zhig gu snyam nas
K10D0287_H0289:228a-11: de shin tu dben pas 'du shes de la rtog
K10D0287_H0289:228a-12: par byed cing de 'du shes des gzugs rnam pa
K10D0287_H0289:228a-13: bcu gcig la mtshan mar dmigs te /
K10D0287_H0289:228a-25: de la 'du shes kyi mtshan mas ring por byed pa ni /
K10D0287_H0289:228a-27: byis ba blo zhan pa rnams kyis thog ma dang /
K10D0287_H0289:228a-28: tha ma med pa'i skye ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:228a-45: gcig la gcig za ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:228a-46: gsog par byed cing don med par gyur pa dpag
K10D0287_H0289:228a-47: tu med pa 'di kun ni bzod par dka' ba
K10D0287_H0289:228b-0: yid kyis kun nas @228b bslang ba'i nyes par byas
K10D0287_H0289:228b-1: pa'i las kyi bye brag bye ba khrag khrig brgya
K10D0287_H0289:228b-2: stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag gis byis pa
K10D0287_H0289:228b-3: so so'i skye bo dag yang dang /

K10D0287_H0289:228b-9: rgyal po'i pho brang du bsten pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:228b-19: dam pa'i chos dang bral ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:228b-20: sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang bral ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:228b-24: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:228b-26: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:228b-31: tshig kyal pa la yid rnam par zhen pa'i 'khor
K10D0287_H0289:228b-32: ba 'di ni ring ngo snyam du 'du shes kyi
K10D0287_H0289:228b-33: mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:228b-34: lha rnams kyi 'khor ba'ang ring bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:228b-39: dri la rab tu chags shing /
K10D0287_H0289:228b-44: bud med kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-9: rnam pa sna tshogs su rtse ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-11: gnas khang la rab tu chags pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-16: me tog man d'a ra ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-18: lha'i glu dbyangs la sems rab tu chags shing /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-19: dam pa'i chos la kha phyir phyogs pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor ba ni ring ngo snyam mo //
K10D0287_H0289:229a-20: yi dvags rnams kyi 'khor ba'ang ring bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-21: nyes par byas pa'i las kyis 'gro ba bkres pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-25: me'i char rab tu 'bab pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-26: mid pa khab tsam la lto ri tsam pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-27: lto sgal ba la zhar ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-29: ser sna skyes shing gcig la gcig mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-30: mun nag tu 'jug cing g-yang sar rab tu ltung ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-35: gshin rje'i mis ral gri dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-38: mdung gis btab cing sdug bsngal ba /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-40: ngar snabs kyi kha zas lo 'bum phrag du mar za ba /
K10D0287_H0289:229a-41: sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchi ma rab tu 'byung zhing bzod par dka' ba /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-0: yul ngan @229b byung zhing gdong dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-2: lus la srin bu 'bum zhugs pa /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-3: lus nad thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhir gyur cing thegs pa /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-4: 'khor bar yun ring du zhugs pa /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-5: lcags kyi bya rog mchu 'bar ba dag gis mig phyung ba /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-6: lus shing bsregs pa 'dra zhing pha rol gyis gnon pa /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-8: dgon pa dpag tshad bye ba brgya phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu zhugs pa /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-10: skom gyi mes lus bsregs pa /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-11: mun nag tu zhugs pa'i yi dvags dag ni dam
K10D0287_H0289:229b-12: pa'i chos mnyan pa la kha phyir phyogs pa yin
K10D0287_H0289:229b-13: te / log par lta bas bsdus pa rnams kyi
K10D0287_H0289:229b-14: 'khor ba ni ring ngo snyam du 'du shes kyi
K10D0287_H0289:229b-15: mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:229b-16: gcig la gcig za zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-17: khong du chud par bya ba ma yin pa shes
K10D0287_H0289:229b-18: pa la kha phyir phyogs pa rnams ni chu dang
K10D0287_H0289:229b-19: / chu la spyod pa rnams rtag tu skom pas gdungs shing snying yongs su skams pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-20: gzung bas 'jigs pa chu srin byis pa gsod dang; chags brkam dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-26: chu srin kum bhi ra dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-28: chu srin ma ka ra dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-29: chu srin nya phyis dang chu srin dung la sogs pa chen po dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-30: chung du rtag tu gcig la gcig za ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:229b-31: de las gzhan pa rgyas bshor zhing bzung bas 'jigs pa rnams dang /
K10D0287_H0289:230a-0: de bzhin du skam sa la rgyu ba ri @230a *//
K10D0287_H0289:230a-11: bse la sogs pa sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis 'ching zhing mtshon gyis gsod pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:230a-14: 'chi bas gcig la gcig gnod pa brgya phrag stong gis nyen pa rnams dang /
K10D0287_H0289:230a-15: de bzhin du nam mkha' la rgyu ba bya rog dang /
K10D0287_H0289:230a-25: bya tsha ya ba lin dang /
K10D0287_H0289:230a-27: bya san ta ba la sogs pa /
K10D0287_H0289:230a-29: bya'i rigs dag gsod pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:230a-33: gcig la gcig za ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:230a-35: tsha bas gnod pa rnams dang /
K10D0287_H0289:230a-36: gnas gsum la gnas pa skams dang /
K10D0287_H0289:230a-38: bar snang la rgyu ba'i dud 'gror gyur pa rnams
K10D0287_H0289:230a-39: la mi bzad cing so so'i 'jigs pa rnams kyi
K10D0287_H0289:230a-40: 'khor ba ni ring bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma
K10D0287_H0289:230a-42: de bzhin du yang sos dang /
K10D0287_H0289:230a-49: mnar med pa rnams kyi mi bzad pa /
K10D0287_H0289:230a-50: bsam pa shin tu ngan pa rnams kyi so so'i
K10D0287_H0289:230b-0: 'jigs pa brgya stong du ma yong @230b pa; me
K10D0287_H0289:230b-3: brkyal ba'i chu bo dmar po'i nang du lus rab tu 'jug pa /
K10D0287_H0289:230b-4: lo ma'i ral gri'i nang du 'jug cing 'dab mas so sor nyams su myong ba /
K10D0287_H0289:230b-5: ba tshva'i chu'i nang du 'jug cing sa rab tu 'bar ba la 'gro ba /
K10D0287_H0289:230b-6: sreg par byed pa'i padma mi bzad pa /
K10D0287_H0289:230b-8: bzod par dka' ba rnam pa du mar mtshungs pa
K10D0287_H0289:230b-9: med pa'i sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi 'khor ba
K10D0287_H0289:230b-10: ni ring bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs
K10D0287_H0289:230b-11: par byed do // dge slong de 'du shes kyi
K10D0287_H0289:230b-12: phung po rab tu rnam par dpyod pa la bstan
K10D0287_H0289:230b-13: du yod cing thogs pa dang bcas pa yun ring
K10D0287_H0289:230b-14: po'i gzugs 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la las dang
K10D0287_H0289:230b-15: par byed do // / 'bras bu'i rgyu'i gzhi dmigs
K10D0287_H0289:230b-16: pa sems can rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tshad brgya
K10D0287_H0289:230b-17: phrag stong gi 'gro bar song ba rnams la lta
K10D0287_H0289:230b-18: par byed do // / bar byed cing / mtshan mar byed la /
K10D0287_H0289:230b-20: gzhi la dmigs pa'i 'du shes rab tu gsal bas mthong ste /
K10D0287_H0289:230b-21: 'khor ba la yid 'byung bar byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:230b-23: ji ltar na dge slong de thung ngu rnam par 'byed cing /
K10D0287_H0289:230b-24: mngon sum du byed ce na /
K10D0287_H0289:230b-25: rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi chos la chos kyi
K10D0287_H0289:230b-26: rjes su lta zhing gnas pa des thos pa las
K10D0287_H0289:230b-29: dge slong de bdud kyi sde rnam par 'jig par byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:230b-30: ji ltar thung ba rnam par 'byed ce na /
K10D0287_H0289:230b-31: 'khor ba thung ba'i brtul zhugs dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231a-2: bla ma la gus pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231a-4: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231a-5: pha ma la gus pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231a-6: sangs rgyas la chos nyan cing lta ba bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231a-10: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa ma yin pa spong ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231a-16: yid las su rung ba dang ldan zhing mi'i snying
K10D0287_H0289:231a-17: dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'khor ba ni thung bar
K10D0287_H0289:231a-18: 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do
K10D0287_H0289:231a-19: // de bzhin du gang dag bag med pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshal dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231a-27: do shal dang; bro gar dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231a-29: shin tu mdzes pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231a-35: gnas kyi khyad par dag spangs nas gang dag tshul khrims kyi rnam pa'i bsam gtan dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231a-36: klog pa la gnas shing legs par lta la kha ton du 'don pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231a-39: yang dag par sdom pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231a-42: smra ba'i tshig nyung ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231a-44: zhi ba'i zas la gnas pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231b-0: lha gang yin pa de dag gi 'khor @231b ba ni thung ngo //
K10D0287_H0289:231b-1: ji skad bshad pa bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa bkres pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231b-4: tshal shing bsregs pa bzhin du dman zhing zhum la skra dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231b-5: gdong shing bsregs pa lta bu'i lus can gang yin
K10D0287_H0289:231b-6: pa de dag sdug bsngal du mi bgrang bar gang
K10D0287_H0289:231b-7: dag skad cig tsam zhig kyang sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231b-9: dge 'dun la dbang po rab tu dang bas dad
K10D0287_H0289:231b-10: pa chung du zhig byas pa de dag gi 'khor
K10D0287_H0289:231b-11: ba ni thung bar 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la
K10D0287_H0289:231b-13: gcig la gcig za zhing rdeg pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231b-17: 'jigs pas 'jigs pa de dag gal te nus na
K10D0287_H0289:231b-18: skad cig tsam du rnam par gnod pa mi bgrang
K10D0287_H0289:231b-19: bar skad cig tsam zhig kyang sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231b-21: dge 'dun la sems dang bar byas pa'i dud 'gro
K10D0287_H0289:231b-22: de dag gi 'khor ba ni thung bar 'du shes
K10D0287_H0289:231b-23: kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:231b-28: ngu 'bod chen po dang; tsha ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:231b-30: mnar med pa la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba
K10D0287_H0289:231b-31: rnams su skyes pa gang dag sdug bsngal shin tu
K10D0287_H0289:231b-32: gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs de dag sdug bsngal
K10D0287_H0289:231b-33: du mi bgrang bar gang dag skad cig tsam du
K10D0287_H0289:231b-34: tshul khrims la sems dad par byed pa'i sems can
K10D0287_H0289:231b-35: dmyal ba de dag gi 'khor ba ni thung bar
K10D0287_H0289:231b-36: 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed de
K10D0287_H0289:232a-0: / @232a *// de de ltar 'khor ba thung bar sems so //
K10D0287_H0289:232a-1: 'khro ba gru bzhi po ji lta bu zhig snyam na /
K10D0287_H0289:232a-2: de byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni
K10D0287_H0289:232a-3: bdag gi ba med cing bdag tu nga rgyal med
K10D0287_H0289:232a-4: la nges par gong du 'gro ba de rnams kyi
K10D0287_H0289:232a-5: 'khro ba ni gru bzhi po yin par 'du shes
K10D0287_H0289:232a-6: kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:232a-9: dud 'gro mi shes par yongs su 'gyur zhing sems
K10D0287_H0289:232a-10: bzang po ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i 'khor
K10D0287_H0289:232a-11: ba ni zlum po yin par 'du shes kyi mtshan
K10D0287_H0289:232a-15: lung du ma bstan pa'i las 'dren ma dang ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:232a-17: 'dren ma mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:232a-18: de la mi dge ba'i las kyis ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su'o //
K10D0287_H0289:232a-19: dge ba'i las kyis ni lha rnams su'o //
K10D0287_H0289:232a-20: 'dren ma sa ni mi rnams su skye ste /
K10D0287_H0289:232a-22: gang dag gnas gsum gyi skye bar skyes pa de
K10D0287_H0289:232a-23: rnams kyi 'khor ba ni zur gsum po yin par
K10D0287_H0289:232a-24: 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs par byed do
K10D0287_H0289:232a-27: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi las lta bur skyes pa'i
K10D0287_H0289:232a-28: lha dag las shi nas lha rnams kyi nang du
K10D0287_H0289:232a-29: skye bar 'gyur / gang dag mi las shi nas
K10D0287_H0289:232a-30: mi rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba mi
K10D0287_H0289:232b-0: khom pa med pa'i @232b sa de dag gi 'khor
K10D0287_H0289:232b-1: ba ni zlum po yin par 'du shes kyi mtshan
K10D0287_H0289:232b-2: ma la dmigs par byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:232b-3: las dmar pos yongs su bzung ba dag ni dud 'gro yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:232b-4: de dag kyang gcig la gcig za zhing dmar po
K10D0287_H0289:232b-5: la dga' ba'i 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la dmigs
K10D0287_H0289:232b-6: par byed do // las kha dog dkar pos yongs su bzung ba ni lha dang /
K10D0287_H0289:232b-8: gtsang zhing dge ba'i las kyi lam rin po che las byung ba'i rim gyis lha dang /
K10D0287_H0289:232b-10: lha 'chi ba na de la lha dag bde 'gro mi'i 'jig rten du bzhud cig ces smra'o //
K10D0287_H0289:232b-11: de bzhin du mi 'chi ba na gnyen dang /
K10D0287_H0289:232b-13: chung ma dag mig mchi mas gang zhing ngom zung
K10D0287_H0289:232b-14: gang pa dag bdag cag thong la bde 'gro mi'i
K10D0287_H0289:232b-15: 'jig rten dgyes par bzhud cig ces smra'o //
K10D0287_H0289:232b-16: de 'di snyam du sems ta; mi de nyid thob kyang gang dge ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:232b-19: shes rab la brtson 'grus med pa de ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:232b-21: dud 'gro'i dgon par gtses shing yongs su 'khyam ste /
K10D0287_H0289:232b-22: so so'i skye bo ni las kyi lam gyis bslus shing chud gzan pa yin no snyam mo //
K10D0287_H0289:232b-23: dge slong de tshor ba'i de nyid mthong ba /
K10D0287_H0289:232b-24: 'du shes kyi phung po la tshul bzhin yid la
K10D0287_H0289:232b-25: byed pa la dmigs pa'i de nyid mthong ba ni
K10D0287_H0289:232b-26: 'di ltar de nyid tshol bar byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:232b-28: gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o //
K10D0287_H0289:233a-1: las reg pa brjod pa'i 'du shes rnam par 'byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:233a-2: gzugs mthong na bzang ba dang /
K10D0287_H0289:233a-12: gzugs kyi dbyibs 'du shes kyis yang dag par rnam
K10D0287_H0289:233a-13: par 'byed cing mtshan mar byed la gzhi la lta
K10D0287_H0289:233a-14: bar byed do // phung po dang /
K10D0287_H0289:233a-16: skye mched kyi gzhi 'du shes su byed cing rnam par 'byed /
K10D0287_H0289:233a-18: mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa shin tu 'byed cing mngon sum du byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:233a-19: rgyu dang ldan pa la dmigs shing /
K10D0287_H0289:233a-20: rgyu ma yin pa dang ldan pa shes nas rnam par spong bar byed /
K10D0287_H0289:233a-22: mi phan pa'i mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba 'das pa la 'du shes su byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:233a-23: ji ltar 'dis bdag gi byas pa nyes pa byas pa'i 'du shes kyis 'du shes par byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:233a-25: gal te 'du shes med na dran pa 'ang med de /
K10D0287_H0289:233a-27: 'du shes su 'brel ba ni de'i dmigs pa yin zhing de'i rkyen yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:233a-29: 'od de'i rkyen de'i gzhi de'i rgyu mar me yin
K10D0287_H0289:233a-30: pa de bzhin du dran pa ni 'du shes kyi
K10D0287_H0289:233a-31: rgyu 'du shes rab tu byung ba 'du shes kyi
K10D0287_H0289:233a-32: bdag po yin no snyam mo //
K10D0287_H0289:233a-33: dge slong des gzhan lnga pa 'du shes reg pa zhes bya ba la 'jug ste /
K10D0287_H0289:233a-34: de yang dag pa'i tshor ba bde ba la 'du
K10D0287_H0289:233b-0: shes su byed @233b kyang de la dga' ba med
K10D0287_H0289:233b-1: la sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi las byas pa
K10D0287_H0289:233b-2: sdug bsngal de'ang 'jigs pa med par de mtshungs par
K10D0287_H0289:233b-3: rtog ste / gser bzang po bzhin no //
K10D0287_H0289:233b-4: dge slong 'du shes can de 'du shes kyi rnam pa gzhan gyis rtog par byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:233b-5: de 'du shes las rnam par grol zhing rtog par
K10D0287_H0289:233b-6: byed pa gzhan ma yin pa bdag gi 'du shes
K10D0287_H0289:233b-9: gzhi ni gang yin snyam mo //
K10D0287_H0289:233b-10: de 'du shes 'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin te /
K10D0287_H0289:233b-11: rkyen tshogs pa des 'di skye zhing de 'gog pa las 'gag par 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:233b-15: nor bu chu shel las chu dang ba 'byung ba de bzhin du rgyu dang /

K10D0287_H0289:315a-10: la zad par ma byas pa de srid du de
K10D0287_H0289:315a-11: ltar lo 'bum phrag du mar sreg go /

K10D0287_H0289:315b-7: mi 'gyur ro snyam nas lam du 'jug pa'i ched

K10D0287_H0289:315b-16: gang nyid du kun tu sems pa de dang /

K10D0287_H0289:315b-24: dag gis rjes su bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad de

K10D0287_H0289:315b-31: dbang po thams cad rnams nyams shing //

K10D0287_H0289:316a-9: gson yang shi ba dag dang mtshungs //

K10D0287_H0289:316a-13: rtag par don kun med par byed //
K10D0287_H0289:316a-14: ngan song gsum gyi them skas te //

K10D0287_H0289:316a-18: chang gi skyon gyis bslus pa yi //

K10D0287_H0289:316a-34: yang ba dag tu nye bar bstan //

K10D0287_H0289:316b-5: skye bo res 'ga' dga' byed cing //

K10D0287_H0289:316b-8: blo ni shin tu rmongs skyed cing //

K10D0287_H0289:316b-11: sreg byed kho na chang yin no //

K10D0287_H0289:316b-23: bdag la 'di yis mi gnod ces //

K10D0287_H0289:316b-26: chang ni dmyal bar 'gro bar byed //

K10D0287_H0289:318b-0: chang @318b 'thung ba ni snga ma bzhin no //

K10D0287_H0289:407b-20: 'khor ba thams cad na bde ba med de /

K10D0287_H0289:407b-28: yid kyi chad pa rnam pa gsum gyi de kho

K10D0287_H0289:420a-6: skyes ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba pa'i mes yud tsam zhig gdungs te /

K10D0287_H0289:420a-8: de'i gnas de yongs su tshol bar byed de; gal te ri'i rgyal po ri rab la 'khyud cing /
K10D0287_H0289:420a-9: de ltar de stong phrag drug cur yongs su bskor la /
K10D0287_H0289:420a-13: nags tshal du bcas pa bskor ba tsam gyis sems
K10D0287_H0289:420a-14: can dmyal ba pa'i me du mas sreg par byed
K10D0287_H0289:420a-15: de / de sems can dmyal ba pa gzhan yun ring du skyes pa dag ni ma gtogs so //

K10D0287_H0289:420a-28: tshal du bcas shing rgya mtsho dang bcas pa sreg go /

K10D0287_H0289:420b-11: sems can dmyal ba pa de las byas shing bskyed pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:420b-13: rnam par phye ba'i dri nga ba de dri gzhan gyis dpe bya bar mi nus so //
K10D0287_H0289:420b-14: de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi bya'i rigs dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /

K10D0287_H0289:420b-25: sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi sha zos /
K10D0287_H0289:420b-27: sha drangs nas khrag la 'thung ngo //
K10D0287_H0289:420b-28: de dag kyang zol nas rkang dag la za'o //

K10D0287_H0289:421a-3: gnyis su drangs nas rab tu za bar byed do

K10D0287_H0289:421a-5: bya so 'byin zhes bya bas mchu gnyi ga phra
K10D0287_H0289:421a-6: skad ltar 'dzin cing rab tu 'bar bas so thams

K10D0287_H0289:421a-12: bar byed do // // bya snying za ba zhes
K10D0287_H0289:421a-13: bya bas gang snying dag gsheg nas za bar byed

K10D0287_H0289:421a-18: bya bu gar za ba zhes bya bas gang sems can dag gi bu ga za bar byed do //

K10D0287_H0289:421a-20: dag phug nas gzhungs pa dag zos te phyir 'byung

K10D0287_H0289:421a-22: kyi bar thams cad phug cing gnad dag phye ste

K10D0287_H0289:421a-24: bya khab ltar 'bigs zhes bya bas gang mchu khab lta bus khrag 'thung ngo //

K10D0287_H0289:421a-26: shing rus pa gzhan dag phug nas rus pa'i bar
K10D0287_H0289:421a-27: na gnas zhes bya bas phyi rol na'ang za bar
K10D0287_H0289:421a-28: byed do // bya pags pa rnam drug za zhes
K10D0287_H0289:421a-29: bya bas gang pags pa rnam pa drug za bar
K10D0287_H0289:421b-0: byed @421b do; ;bya sen mo 'byin zhes bya bas
K10D0287_H0289:421b-1: gang sen mo thams cad 'byin to //

K10D0287_H0289:421b-3: bya rgyus pa 'byin zhes bya bas gang rgyus pa thams cad phyung nas za'o //
K10D0287_H0289:421b-4: bya skra shad 'dzings zhes bya bas skra drung nas 'byin par byed do //

K10D0287_H0289:421b-6: stong na bya 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa zhes bya
K10D0287_H0289:421b-7: ba des sems can dmyal ba pa de las gzhan

K10D0287_H0289:421b-9: du mar za bar byed cing yang slar 'byung bar

K10D0287_H0289:421b-19: shing grogs med la las kyi zhags pa'i bcing bas

K10D0287_H0289:421b-21: par zhugs so // sems can dmyal ba'i tshogs thams
K10D0287_H0289:421b-22: cad pas ches shin tu nyon mongs par zhugs la
K10D0287_H0289:421b-23: par zhugs so // ngam grog dang / g-yang sa zhes bya ba'i phyogs su rgyug ste /

K10D0287_H0289:421b-26: shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon sha can du 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:421b-27: sdug bsngal tsha zhing mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyis mngon par gdungs so //

K10D0287_H0289:422a-0: @422a *// yan lag thams cad rab tu zhum pa na ngam grog dang /
K10D0287_H0289:422a-1: g-yang sa zhes bya ba'i yul de 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10D0287_H0289:422a-3: g-yang sa dpag tshad sum stong yod pa'i yul der de ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0287_H0289:422a-4: yang las kyis byas pa'i rlung gis 'deg cing de 'dor ba na /
K10D0287_H0289:422a-8: 'ug pa rnams kyis za bar byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:422a-9: de nas yang rlung spu gri dang /
K10D0287_H0289:422a-10: me lta bus gyen du 'deg cing 'dor ba na /
K10D0287_H0289:422a-11: de dag nyid kyis za bar byed de /
K10D0287_H0289:422a-12: de ltar de 'deg cing 'dor ba lo 'bum phrag du mar byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:422a-13: de la gal te yang de las thar na 'khor
K10D0287_H0289:422a-14: lo ltar yongs su bskor ba mtshan ma'i bar zhes
K10D0287_H0289:422a-15: bya ba'i phyogs su rgyug go /
K10D0287_H0289:422a-16: phyogs der yang 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong yod la lte
K10D0287_H0289:422a-17: ba rdo rje las byas pa shin tu 'bar zhing
K10D0287_H0289:422a-19: de dang lhan cig 'gro ba nyid kyis 'khor lo de lus la bab nas 'khor ro //
K10D0287_H0289:422a-20: mgo'i 'khor lo gcig gis klad pa 'thag par byed /
K10D0287_H0289:422a-21: de nas klad rgyas rab tu 'bar ba dag 'byung
K10D0287_H0289:422a-22: ba nas mig gi bar du 'byung bar byed do
K10D0287_H0289:422a-23: // phrag pa gnyis ka la 'khor lo gnyis 'khor te des rus pa dang /
K10D0287_H0289:422a-24: rkang dag phye mar rlog go /

K10D0287_H0289:422a-28: / de bzhin du de'i brang la 'khor lo rab tu 'bar ba yongs su 'khor te /
K10D0287_H0289:422a-29: des de'i rus pa thams cad bcom bcom nas 'thag ste /
K10D0287_H0289:422b-0: bye ma'i phye ma bzhin du @422b byed do; ;de'i
K10D0287_H0289:422b-1: rgyab la'ang lcags kyi me mdag gis reg cing 'khor
K10D0287_H0289:422b-4: rgyab kyi rus par gtogs pa la sogs pa thams cad 'joms so //
K10D0287_H0289:422b-5: de nas de'i 'doms su lcags kyi mtshon brang kol li ka 'byung ste /
K10D0287_H0289:422b-6: des 'doms thams cad gtsub shing bzhin du gtsubs nas
K10D0287_H0289:422b-7: 'dren par byed cing de'i long ga thams cad 'bigs

K10D0287_H0289:422b-10: pus mo'i lha nga la'ang 'khor lo 'byung ste /
K10D0287_H0289:422b-11: des pus mo'i lha nga de 'bigs par byed do //
K10D0287_H0289:422b-12: de bzhin du long bu la'ang 'byung ste /
K10D0287_H0289:422b-13: des de'i rus pa dag phug nas rkang dag za bar byed do //
